Address.label: Address
Address.value: 299 SW CLAY STREET,SUITE 350, PORTLAND, Oregon, 97201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Schnitzer Steel Industries is one of the largest ferrous and nonferrous scrap metal recyclers in the U.S. Its metal recycling business collects and recycles auto bodies, rail cars, appliances, machinery, and construction demolition. Additionally, Schnitzer operates an auto-parts business that purchases obsolete vehicles and sells any useful parts to retail customers and a steelmaking business that supplies construction products along the U.S. West Coast.
